alert.note: Alert for Newton; Orange (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 29 at 9:20AM CDT until April 01 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Louisiana...Texas... Sabine River Near Deweyville Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sabine River Near Deweyville. * WHEN...Until Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...At 24.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 24.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:45 AM CDT Wednesday was 24.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Saturday morning and continue falling to 23.4 feet Monday morning. - Flood stage is 24.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Sabine River Deweyville 24.0 24.3 Wed 7 am CDT 24.2 24.2 24.0 &&
